name: ImpatientsCharacterLogisticSlotsInfiniteResearchCheapVersion
title: Impatient's Character Logistic Slots Infinite Research (Cheap Version)
author: Impatient
description:
You want to be able to maintain a lot of orders from the log net? But without cheating? This mod is for you.

This mod adds a reasonable priced, infinite research technology for the character's logistic slots.
